name: Sausage Dog Tends To Infinity
description:
You are a sausage dog. You must solve puzzles and uncover the ancient wisdom of your ancestors. Only through stretching yourself to infinity may you discover deep truth. Only through deep truth may you grow.

Do not cease from exploration.

Sausage Dog Tends To Infinity is a single-player 3D Sokoban-like puzzle game, in which you are an infinitely-stretching sausage dog who must solve puzzles to uncover hidden wisdom and find the answers to the world's deepest mysteries. Expand yourself across 31 unique challenging levels, each revealing another cryptic clue.
